column4: is it simply that package that needs installing, or any other modifications to be made?
gnome3 crashed in beta2, i reported bugs, not fixed..
man, i waited 5 days with a freshly built PC, for the release, to save me reinstalling, as im running a fully encrypted system
are the devs trying to force us to use unity, by screwing up the gnome-shell package?
i guess they want us to use unity
they want to promote unity.. correct.
this is support channel - not a complaint channel..
i have no idea what problem you are even talking about.
if you insist it works fine, can you help me debug ?
im just now installing on my new desktop. my other beta box has been headless for 2 weeks. :)
ok, no idea whats up, it was the same on beta for me, and that was on another machine...
do you have any idea how i can get hold of older proprietary drivers that Jockey provides?
there might be ppa's of older ones..
